mapper.update: update STOCK_PRICE set STOCK_DATE_SEQ = ( select count(0) from STOCK_PRICE s2 where s2.STOCK_NUM = STOCK_PRICE.STOCK_NUM and s2.STOCK_DATE <= STOCK_PRICE.STOCK_DATE and IS_VALID = 1 ) where IS_VALID = 1

update STOCK_PRICE set STOCK_DATE_SEQ = ( select count(0) from STOCK_PRICE s2 where s2.STOCK_NUM = STOCK_PRICE.STOCK_NUM and s2.STOCK_DATE <= STOCK_PRICE.STOCK_DATE and IS_VALID = 1 ) where STOCK_DATE_SEQ is null and IS_VALID = 1
mapper.insert: insert into STOCK_ANALYSIS_DATA (AD_TYPE, STOCK_NUM, STOCK_DATE, AD_VALUE, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) select #{adType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AD_TYPE, STOCK_NUM, STOCK_DATE, ( select sum(PRICE_CLOSING) / count(0) from STOCK_PRICE where STOCK_NUM = sp1.STOCK_NUM and STOCK_DATE_SEQ > sp1.STOCK_DATE_SEQ - #{maParam,jdbcType=INTEGER} and STOCK_DATE_SEQ <= sp1.STOCK_DATE_SEQ ) AD_VALUE, datetime('now', 'localtime') as LAST_MODIFIED_DATE from STOCK_PRICE sp1 where STOCK_NUM = #{stockNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STOCK_DATE_SEQ >= #{maParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}

insert into STOCK_ANALYSIS_DATA (AD_TYPE, STOCK_NUM, STOCK_DATE, AD_VALUE, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) select #{adType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AD_TYPE, STOCK_NUM, STOCK_DATE, ( select sum(PRICE_CLOSING) / count(0) from STOCK_PRICE where STOCK_NUM = sp1.STOCK_NUM and STOCK_DATE_SEQ > sp1.STOCK_DATE_SEQ - #{maParam,jdbcType=INTEGER} and STOCK_DATE_SEQ <= sp1.STOCK_DATE_SEQ ) AD_VALUE, datetime('now', 'localtime') as LAST_MODIFIED_DATE from STOCK_PRICE sp1 where STOCK_DATE_SEQ >= #{maParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}

insert into STOCK_ANALYSIS_DATA (AD_TYPE, STOCK_NUM, STOCK_DATE, AD_VALUE, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) select #{adType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AD_TYPE, sp1.STOCK_NUM, sp1.STOCK_DATE, ( select sum(PRICE_CLOSING) / count(0) from STOCK_PRICE where STOCK_NUM = sp1.STOCK_NUM and STOCK_DATE_SEQ > sp1.STOCK_DATE_SEQ - #{maParam,jdbcType=INTEGER} and STOCK_DATE_SEQ <= sp1.STOCK_DATE_SEQ ) AD_VALUE, datetime('now', 'localtime') as LAST_MODIFIED_DATE from STOCK_PRICE sp1 left outer join STOCK_ANALYSIS_DATA sa1 on sp1.STOCK_NUM = sa1.STOCK_NUM and sp1.STOCK_DATE = sa1.STOCK_DATE and sa1.AD_TYPE = #{adType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sp1.STOCK_DATE > #{effectiveDateStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sa1.STOCK_NUM is null and STOCK_DATE_SEQ >= #{maParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from STOCK_ANALYSIS_DATA where AD_TYPE = #{adType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STOCK_DATE > datetime('now', 'localtime', #{dayRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select sp.* from STOCK_PRICE sp inner join ( select STOCK_NUM, max(STOCK_DATE) as STOCK_DATE from STOCK_PRICE where IS_VALID = 1 group by STOCK_NUM ) tmp on sp.STOCK_NUM = tmp.STOCK_NUM and sp.STOCK_DATE = tmp.STOCK_DATE
